speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me when your symptoms started?

speaker: Patient
text: "I think it started about a month ago, to be honest, I was feeling pretty normal after I finished my sinusitis treatment, but then I started to feel really tired and had some aches in my sides. It's been a bit of a persistent feeling, to be honest."

speaker: Doctor
text: Did you experience any fever or flank pain before starting the antibiotics?

speaker: Patient
text: "Oh, yes, I did have a fever when I was taking the amoxicillin. It was a pretty high fever, and I had to take it down with some acetaminophen. It was a bit concerning, to be honest, since I didn't have any symptoms like that with my sinusitis."

speaker: Doctor
text: Have you noticed any changes in your urine, like it being cloudy or smelly? REQUEST TEST: Urinalysis

speaker: Measurement
text: RESULTS: Leukocyturia (6%), Bacterial_Culture (Negative), pH Normal, Protein Normal, Blood Normal, Ketones Normal, Glucose Normal, Specific_Gravity Normal, WBC Normal, RBC Normal, RBC Cast Normal, Protein Cast Normal, Blood Cast Normal, White_Blood_Cells Present (3%), Casts Present (1%), Crystalline_Casts Present (0%), Red_Blood_Cells Present (0%), Granular_Cast Normal

speaker: Doctor
text: Do you have a history of kidney problems or diabetes?

speaker: Patient
text: "No, I don't think so. I do have a history of high blood pressure and high cholesterol, though. But I've been managing those with my medications."

speaker: Doctor
text: Are you experiencing any swelling in your legs or ankles?

speaker: Patient
text: "Actually, I have noticed that my feet have been feeling a bit heavier than usual, but I couldn't quite put my finger on it. It's not painful, though, and it's not like I'm experiencing any swelling, per se. It's just that my clothes seem to be feeling a bit tighter than they did before."

speaker: Doctor
text: Have you had any recent urinary tract infections or other infections? REQUEST TEST: Urinalysis and Blood Cultures

speaker: Measurement
text:
RESULTS:

speaker: Doctor
text: Do you have any nausea or vomiting? DIAGNOSIS READY: Acute Pyelonephritis pending urinalysis and blood culture results.
